author: gangolli
msg: Added web resource refs.  Unfortunately, XDoclet's webdoclet wants them to be in the improperly-named ejb-resourcerefs.xml file).

Added back web-security.xml but with a comment only.  If you don't have any file here, XDoclet puts in a default filler comment that could be misleading to people installing/editing the generated file.

author: snoopdave
msg: Fixing small bug that prevented editor menu from rendering on blog pages
